problems_addressed.solution_summary: Danielle Dowell shares strategies on how she and her team are preparing for the spring market.
Kim Rittberg teaches REALTORS how to enhance their video marketing skills.

target_avatars.relevance: The episode provides insights into preparing for the spring market and improving personal branding.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Utilize expert strategies to gear up for the spring market and leverage video marketing to enhance your brand.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: We have different speakers, different sessions, and this time it's totally free.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Highlights the value of the free summit and its new offerings.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Don't miss out on our free real estate summit with new sessions and expert speakers!

key_tactics.tactic: Attend the free live summit for expert insights.
key_tactics.context: Sign up using the promo code 'podcast' to access the summit for free.

quotable_insights: Sign up for our free summit and learn from top producers and coaches.

resources_mentioned.name: keepingitrealwebinar.com
resources_mentioned.context: Platform to sign up for the free real estate summit.

episode_summary: In this special episode, D.J. Paris announces a free live summit featuring top real estate experts. Listeners can learn strategies for the spring market, engage in a live coaching session, and enhance their video marketing skills. The summit offers valuable insights and is accessible at no cost using a promo code.
